contentList.content: Your <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> increases by 1, and you achieve <LSTag Type="Tooltip" Tooltip="Expertise">expertise</LSTag> in <LSTag Tooltip="Acrobatics">Acrobatics</LSTag>. You gain a specialized ability to throw a dagger, causing <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLEEDING">bleeding</LSTag> in your target. This ability can be activated as an <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="YMS_Throw_KnifeJuggler_Action">Action</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="YMS_Throw_KnifeJuggler_BonusAction">Bonus Action</LSTag>, or <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="YMS_Throw_KnifeJuggler_ReactionAction">Reaction</LSTag>. When you throw a dagger using this skill, your Dexterity <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">modifier</LSTag> is added and Strength modifier is subtracted to both the <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">attack roll</LSTag> and the damage roll.

Quickly throws a dagger, damaging the enemy and causing <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLEEDING">bleeding</LSTag>. After throwing a dagger, you go into <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="KNIFE_THROW_PENALTY">Knife Juggling Fatigue</LSTag>.
The intricate dagger tricks cause your concentration to waver, leading to a decrease in Dexterity by 1 for the remaining turn.

The Boomerang Blade is designed to precisely hit a single target before returning to its owner. However, there are instances where the dagger may choose to remain at its landing spot, considered a period for the weapon to recharge its energy and strengthen its bond with the wielder. Owners must always be prepared for the possibility of the blade not returning, using this unpredictability to fortify their connection with the dagger.
Throwing attacks scale with your <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> instead of your <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> if your Dexterity is higher.

Make a melee attack causing bleeding with your main-hand dagger. After stabbing a dagger, you go into Knife Juggling Fatigue.

You must be equipped with a dagger to use it.

Make a melee attack causing bleeding with your off-hand dagger. After stabbing a dagger, you go into Knife Juggling Fatigue.

You must be equipped with a dagger to use it.
